results.title: Simvastatin mitigates diabetic nephropathy by upregulating farnesoid X receptor and Nrf2/HO-1 signaling and attenuating oxidative stress and inflammation in rats.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ effectively ameliorated @<m>DISEASE_Hyperglycemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@, @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@kidney hypertrophy@@@, body @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@, and @DISEASE_Soft_Tissue_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D017695 @@@tissue injury and@@@ @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ animals.

citations.NLM: Hasan IH, Shaheen SY, Alhusaini AM, Mahmoud AM. Simvastatin mitigates diabetic nephropathy by upregulating farnesoid X receptor and Nrf2/HO-1 signaling and attenuating oxidative stress and inflammation in rats. Life Sci. 2024 Mar 1;340():122445. PMID: 38278349

results.title: ncBAF enhances PXR-mediated transcriptional activation in the human and mouse liver.
results.text_hl: Activation of @GENE_NR1I2 @GENE_8856 @@@PXR@@@ by drugs such as @CHEMICAL_Rifampin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012293 @@@rifampicin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_efavirenz @CHEMICAL_MESH:C098320 @@@efavirenz@@@ causes adverse reactions such as drug-drug interaction, @<m>DISEASE_Hyperglycemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@, and @DISEASE_Dyslipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D050171 @@@dyslipidemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Kurosawa K, Nakano M, Yokoseki I, Nagaoka M, Takemoto S, Sakai Y, Kobayashi K, Kazuki Y, Fukami T, Nakajima M. ncBAF enhances PXR-mediated transcriptional activation in the human and mouse liver. Biochem Pharmacol. 2023 Aug 3;215():115733. PMID: 37543347

results.title: Simvastatin restores ischemic preconditioning in the presence of hyperglycemia through a nitric oxide-mediated mechanism.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ restores ischemic preconditioning in the presence of @<m>DISEASE_Hyperglycemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@ through a @CHEMICAL_Nitric_Oxide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009569 @@@nitric oxide@@@-mediated mechanism.

citations.NLM: Gu W, Kehl F, Krolikowski JG, Pagel PS, Warltier DC, Kersten JR. Simvastatin restores ischemic preconditioning in the presence of hyperglycemia through a nitric oxide-mediated mechanism. Anesthesiology. 2008 Apr;108(4):634-42. PMID: 18362595

results.title: Management of dyslipidemia and hyperglycemia with a fixed-dose combination of sitagliptin and simvastatin
results.text_hl: Management of @DISEASE_Dyslipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D050171 @@@dyslipidemia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hyperglycemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@ with a fixed-dose combination of @CHEMICAL_Sitagliptin_Phosphate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068900 @@@sitagliptin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@

results.title: Protection by simvastatin on hyperglycemia-induced endothelial dysfunction through inhibiting NLRP3 inflammasomes
results.text_hl: Protection by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Hyperglycemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@-induced @DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@ through inhibiting @GENE_DFNA34 @GENE_114548 @@@NLRP3@@@ inflammasomes

results.title: Simvastatin Ameliorates Diabetic Cardiomyopathy by Attenuating Oxidative Stress and Inflammation in Rats
results.text_hl: ...3.2. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ Prevents @<m>DISEASE_Hyperglycemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@Hyperglycemia@@@-Induced Damage and Collagen Deposition in the @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@Diabetic Heart@@@

results.title: Pharmacometabolomic signature links simvastatin therapy and insulin resistance.
results.text_hl: Results: Six weeks of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment resulted in 6.9% of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ developing @<m>DISEASE_Hyperglycemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@ and 25% developing changes consistent with development of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@pre-diabetes@@@.

citations.NLM: Elbadawi-Sidhu M, Baillie RA, Zhu H, Chen YI, Goodarzi MO, Rotter JI, Krauss RM, Fiehn O, Kaddurah-Daouk R. Pharmacometabolomic signature links simvastatin therapy and insulin resistance. Metabolomics. 2017 Jan;13():. PMID: 29732238
citations.BibTeX: @article{29732238, title={Pharmacometabolomic signature links simvastatin therapy and insulin resistance.}, author={Elbadawi-Sidhu M and Baillie RA and Zhu H and Chen YI and Goodarzi MO and Rotter JI and Krauss RM and Fiehn O and Kaddurah-Daouk R}, journal={Metabolomics}, volume={13}}

results.title: The Effect of Simvastatin on Glucose Homeostasis in Streptozotocin Induced Type 2 Diabetic Rats
results.text_hl: These data indicate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ intervention @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ may cause @<m>DISEASE_Hyperglycemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@ by impairing the function of islet beta cells and have an adverse effect on @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ homeostasis, especially on FPG level.

citations.NLM: Wang L, Duan G, Lu Y, Pang S, Huang X, Jiang Q, Dang N. The Effect of Simvastatin on Glucose Homeostasis in Streptozotocin Induced Type 2 Diabetic Rats J Diabetes Res. 2013;2013():274986. PMID: 23671864
citations.BibTeX: @article{23671864, title={The Effect of Simvastatin on Glucose Homeostasis in Streptozotocin Induced Type 2 Diabetic Rats}, author={Wang L and Duan G and Lu Y and Pang S and Huang X and Jiang Q and Dang N}, journal={J Diabetes Res}, volume={2013}, pages={274986}}

results.title: Vascular reactivity in the experimental, simvastatin-treated diabetes with endothelial dysfunction.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: We observed that @<m>DISEASE_Hyperglycemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@ and @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight-loss@@@ observed in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were partially treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, but were still different from the control group.

citations.NLM: Yalcin S, Köksoy C, Ergül E, Demirel E, Yalcin B. Vascular reactivity in the experimental, simvastatin-treated diabetes with endothelial dysfunction. Bratisl Lek Listy. 2008;109(11):477-82. PMID: 19205554

results.title: Statins exacerbate glucose intolerance and hyperglycemia in a high sucrose fed rodent model
results.text_hl: Here, we treated @DISEASE_Sucrase_isomaltase_deficiency_congenital @DISEASE_MESH:C538139 @@@HSD@@@ fed @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with high dose statins using @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ (20 mg/kg) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (30 mg/kg) for a shorter duration (30 days) to push hard on the prospect of statins worsening @<m>DISEASE_Hyperglycemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@ and @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ signaling.

citations.NLM: Seshadri S, Rapaka N, Prajapati B, Mandaliya D, Patel S, Muggalla CS, Kapadia B, Babu PP, Misra P, Saxena U. Statins exacerbate glucose intolerance and hyperglycemia in a high sucrose fed rodent model Sci Rep. 2019 Jun 19;9(1):8825. PMID: 31217552
